The child is living with her parents in the village and the parents of the child depend on seasonal forest
product. As their houses situated in the dense forest they used to eat mango carmel and kind of root as
food. Lack of job opportunity makes the father to sit idle sits and drink alcohol. Since tribal culture
allow them for drinking and that became part of their life and that gradually leads irresponsible towards
the family. Situation compelled mother to work. With the meager amount she cannot afford education
and proper nutrition to the child. At last mother of the child requested for child to be included in the
program. '
